title: Invex Gaming 1v1 Tournament

embed.description: Page Permalink: http://bit.ly/invex1v1LoLTournament Tournament Type: Online (2 day event) Registration Starts: March 30st, 2016 11:45 PM AEST Registration Ends: April 10th, 2016 11:45 PM AEST Event Starts: April 16th, 2016 10:00 AM AEST Event Ends: April 17th, 2016 9:00 PM AEST Requirements to enter: Be at least level 25 and own at least 10 champions.

body:
Invex Gaming is an oceanic based gaming community and we are running our first ever League of Legends community event. The event is mainly running for people to have fun with friends and is open to everybody regardless of rank. With that being said there are some prizes as well so if you are free over the two days, why not participate!

**Tournament Details**

**Tournament Type:** Online (2 day event)
**Registration Starts:** March 30st, 2016 11:45 PM AEST
**Registration Ends:** April 10th, 2016 11:45 PM AEST
**Event Starts:** April 16th, 2016 10:00 AM AEST
**Event Ends:**  April 17th, 2016  9:00 PM AEST
**Open to:** Public
**Requirements to enter:** Be at least level 25 and own at least 10 champions.
**Entry Cost:** 0 (Free)
**Organiser:** Byte
**Server:** OCE
**Maximum participants:** up to 64 individuals
**Bracket:** Single Elimination 1v1. Each match is a best of 1 (bo1) except for the semi-finals, 3rd/4th place decider and finals which are a best of 3 (bo3)

**Prizes (Provided by Invex Gaming)**
1st Place (Grand Champion): 2590 RP
2nd Place (Runner Up): 975 RP
3rd Place: 640 RP
4th Place: 490 RP

**Prizes (Provided by Riot Games)**
1st Place (Grand Champion): 1000 RP + Mystery Skin + 10 win IP Boost
2nd Place (Runner Up): Mystery Skin + 10 win IP Boost
3rd Place - 16th Place: 10 win IP Boost

**How to Enter**
For details on how to enter and for more information including the format please visit:
http://bit.ly/invex1v1LoLTournament

**Help/Support/Questions**
You can send all enquiries via email to: **byte@invexgaming.com.au**

You can also add me in game but I may take a while to get back to you!

replies.body: Sounds like a lot of fun! Will be there.
